title: AWESOME 3BR 1BA A TRUE GEM!! HW DW W&D GARAGE BUS TO HVD A MUST SEE!!
posting_body: PLEASE CALL 617-586-6222 WITH QUESTIONS OR TO SCHEDULE A VIEWING.
VIEWINGS CAN NOT BE SCHEDULED VIA EMAIL OR TEXT.
The spacious unit features a large living room with a dining area, renovated eat-in kitchen with new stainless appliances.
There are three very good-sized bedrooms and one full tiled bath.
There are newly refinished, gleaming hardwood floors throughout.
The unit has been freshly painted.
There are newer vinyl windows throughout.
The heat is by gas and the tenant pays for all of their own utilities.
A washer and dryer are included for the tenant's convenience in the basement and there is some additional storage located there as well.
Two to three off-street parking spaces are included including one garage space.
The unit has a great deck and yard for your outdoor enjoyment.
This home is conveniently located just moments from the Commuter Rail to North Station, buses to Harvard Square, and many shops and amenities that Waverley Square and Cushing Square has to offer.
Easy access to routes 2, 128, and the Mass Pike make this a commuter's dream.
Applicants must be well qualified and have good credit per the owner's request.
Sorry, no pets, and smoking is not permitted inside the home.
Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
Photos of managed buildings may be representative only and not of the actual unit available.
